post.title: brand new sealed iphone 3gs 16gb black
post.content: i have a brand new iphone 3gs 16gb black from fido, asking for $520 the phone is still factory sealed and have not been opened yet. i also have fido receipt to show proof of purchase. call me at 647-886-4361 local pick up only in the gta (specifically location would be keele and sheppard) no shipping tai
